page.title: 13THE COWDRAY ARMS
page.content: In the morning their routine is to clean the place up, do the garden, switch on the fruit machines and the video games. They open from 7.30a.m to 11.00 for breakfasts. Sometimes they have people come down from Gatwick for breakfast as not many places serve breakfast. They open again from 12.00 to 2.30p.m. when they serve pub lunches. Evening opening times are from 6.00p.m.until 10.30p.m. They have tried to make it a family pub, by having a children's room with 2 electronic games, a mirror and lots of posters on the walls. There is also a speaker which plays music and the pub workers can talk to the children if they want to. When we visited it poured with rain and we had to paddle from the children's room to the pub! In the cellar the beer barrels, crisps, vegetables etc. are stored.
